img_summary: The image shows a scene from a video game where a character, resembling a humanoid monkey, is engaged in a battle in a desert-like environment. The character is facing a large, dust-covered creature in the background. The interface displays various icons and gauges, including health bars and ability icons, indicating gameplay elements. The name "Yellow Wind Sage" appears at the bottom, likely referring to the character or the enemy. The setting is dynamic, with dust and debris being kicked up, suggesting an intense action sequence.
